src:
Mayor Schaff on Oakland's clean economy

05 Nov 2019, 22:02




Libby Schaaf, the mayor of Oakland, welcomes the VERGE community to the city. She announces the City's official Clean Economy Week and speaks to the ways in which cities like Oakland are critical to accelerating the clean economy.

Related Videos
